rundown: 6-9 L @ Kansas City Royals Erick Fedde: 4.2 innings, 4 earned runs, 5 hits, 1 HR, 3 strikeouts Batters: Marcell Ozuna (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 3 RBI) Austin Riley (1 hit - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) Matt Olson (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 1 RBI) The Braves fell to the Kansas City Royals in a high-scoring affair, unable to overcome a late-game surge from their opponents. Despite a strong offensive showing with 14 hits, the Braves' pitching could not contain the Royals' lineup. Key highlights include: 1. Marcell Ozuna's standout performance with 2 hits, including a home run and 3 RBIs. 2. Austin Riley also contributed with a home run, adding to the Braves' offensive efforts. 3. The Royals capitalized on the Braves' pitching struggles, scoring 9 runs on 12 hits.
